p: - The bimodal posterior distribution for infectious and incubation period in Figures 3C-D suggest there could be an issue with the model fitting. Two possibilities come to mind: either a lack of parameter identifiability in the model itself, or poor mixing of the MCMC chains. I would suggest testing for each of these. What do the pairwise correlations between the posteriors look like? What is the effective sample size of the MCMC outputs for each parameter?
